title: League client update alpha
body:
League client update alpha
Offline
Network Operations – Last Thursday at 10:39 PM
The League client alpha is temporarily turned off while we work on a critical issue. We'll reboot as soon as possible.

Is there an ETA on when the servers willbe back up?

replies.body: It should be up in Riot regions. Other regions should be back online within the day (hopefully!)

Out of curiosity, what was so great an issue that it stopped the Alpha Client from being tested on live servers for four days? Was it some sort of communication error between the server and Alpha Client or just something direly wrong with the Alpha?
Something like https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DwjAA1o-jr8 . We never want players to be put into a situation where they are forced to dodge from champ select.
Nope. It must be really serious. Riot _**does not**_ like to use the word _critical_

I have excellent news! The Client is patched and we can use it again.

Source: I'm on right now{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
